description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=1/3, Mature Content=0/3. Chill during the cool season! Walk around and answer 500 all new questions! Whip snowballs at your friends. Find presents to dress the snowman! Get into the spirit with Ask My Avatar Winter!
